Load packages
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(readxl)
library(ggplot2)
library(RColorBrewer)
```
Establish path:
```{r}
here::i_am("DIT_DO/DIT_DO.Rmd")
```
Load data:
```{r}
DO <- read.csv(here("DIT_DO/data/DO_data.csv"))
```
Configure data
```{r}
short_DO <- DO %>%
  group_by(shortID,day) %>%
  pivot_longer(read1:read5) %>%
  summarize(mean = mean(value,na.rm = T),
            sd = sd(value, na.rm=T),
            shortID = shortID) %>%
  unique()

all_DO <- DO %>%
  mutate(mean = apply(X = DO[,4:8],MARGIN = 1,FUN=mean)) %>%
  mutate(sd = apply(X = DO[,4:8],MARGIN = 1,FUN=sd))

#mutate(shortID = sub("DIT_0{1,6}_INC-([a-z]+{1,3})", "\\1", DO$sampleID))
```
Make graph!
```{r}
short_DO$shortID <- factor(short_DO$shortID, levels = c('FC1','FL1','BC1','BL1','SC1','SL1'))

short_DO %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = day, y = mean, color = shortID)) +
  geom_point() +
  theme_bw() +
  theme(legend.position = "bottom", legend.box = "horizontal", legend.title = element_blank()) +
  xlab("Day") +
  ylab("DO (ppm)") +
  geom_errorbar(aes(ymin=mean-sd, ymax=mean+sd),width=0.2) +
  geom_line() +
  scale_color_brewer(palette="Dark2")
```
